SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
Abstract class to generalize an action of the game
ActionPanel
The panel that allows the construction of an action, letting the user choose between the family members and the servants he wants to use in the action.
ActionSpace
This class represents the space that can receive one or more family member.
ActivateLeaderCardCommand
Command to notify the server about the client's intention to activate a leader effect
AskAuthenticationCommand
This command asks the user to send his credentials to log into the game before the match starts
AskAuthenticationPanel
A panel to request the user to authenticate and notify the gamepanel when he's done that
AskFinishRoundOrDiscardCommand
This command asks the client if they want to end the turn or discard a leader card
AskForExcommunicationPaymentCommand
The command that asks the player if they want to pay coins to avoid excommunication.
AskForReconnectionCommand
Command to ask for player reconnection
AskMoveCommand
The command to ask the player about the move they want to play.
AskPrivilegeChoiceCommand
This command asks the player what type of reward they want to get from a Privilege Choice
AskSatanMoveCommand
Fifth player extension: Ask the player representing Satan for their choice
AssignColorCommand
Server assigns the color to a player through this command
AtomicExchangeEffect
The Class AtomicExchangeEffect is strictly related to the ResourcesExchangeEffect.
AuthenticatedCorrectlyCommand
Server notifies the client they authenticated correctly
Board
This class represents the board with all the areas you can find in the physical board.
BoardConstants
The constants related to the Board
BoardInitializer
This class initializes the board components by taking decoding information stored in files
BoardPanel
This JPanel extension is the left-side of the frame, the one containing the board image with all his components, at the moment of the creation the board image is scaled maintaining the proportions to adapt it to any kind of screen, components put into this BoardPanel must set the bounds for themselves and scale their dimensions to create a responsive UI.
Bonus
This class represents the various bonuses that a player has and accumulates over time during the gameplay
BuildingCard
A card of type Building
BuildingDeck
A deck of building cards
Card
The Abstract Class to generalize a card.
CardButton
A development card button that positions itself on the board based on the parameters passed to the constructor.
CardConstants
Constants related to the deck and cards
CardFactory
A factory to create development Cards based on the Type
CardType
The Enum CardType representing the type of a development card
CardTypeException
Exception thrown when the card id is wrong
CesareBorgiaEffect
This class represents the effect of the leader card with the same name
CharacterCard
A card of type Character
CharacterDeck
A deck of character cards
CharacterImmediateEffect
All the CharacterCards activate a flag variable in the bonuses related to a player so they can be considered as "immediate" because what they do is just set a flag when acquired hence when its immediateEffect activates.
ChatMessageClientCommand
This command is used to notify the Server of the Client's chat message
ChatMessageServerCommand
The Server sends the Client chat messages
ChooseAction
The panel that lets the user choose what he wants to do when it's his turn.
ChooseExcommunicationPanel
The Panel that lets the player choose if he wants to be excommunicated or support the church
ChooseLeaderCardCommand
At the beginning of the match each player has to choose four leader cards in four different steps, this class represent the server request to choose a card for each step.
ChoosePrivilegePanel
The Panel that lets the player choose the resources given by a council privilege
ChooseProductionExchangeEffectsCommand
This command asks the player that requested a production action to choose between the various resource exchange effects that the cards he owns have.
ChosenLeaderCardCommand
This command notifies the Server about the leader card choice made by one client
ChosenPrivilegeCommand
this command represents the Client's choice about the possible resources given by a council privilege
Church
This class represents the church component of the game
ChurchSupportCommand
this command represents the Client's answer about the possible decision to pay to prevent excommunication true if you want to support, false otherwise
ClientCommandHandler
Concrete implementor of ServerToClientCommandObserver: manages the messages from the server calling methods of the view and network interfaces to update the user of the server message.
ClientConstants
This class contains all the constants related to the client that are needed both by the CLI and the GUI.
ClientController
This class represents the client controller that takes care of sending through the network all the commands requested by the player
ClientHandler
A runnable abstract messages client-server handler to be implemented by classes using different connection types
ClientHandlerInterface
RMI interface extension for Client Handler
ClientHandlerInterfaceImpl
Implementation of the ClientHandler RMI interface
ClientHandlerSocket
Wrapper for server side socket.
ClientInterface
RMI client interface.
ClientLauncher
Client launcher: Asks the user the type of connection and UI and instantiates respective objects and connects
ClientRMIInterface
This class connects the client and the server using RMI.
ClientSocketInterface
The NetworkInterface implementors that uses Socket technology.
ClientSocketListener
Socket listener for incoming server communication
ClientToServerCommand
This abstract class represents a generic command that a client needs to submit to the server
CloseClientCommand
This command is used to notify that the server decides to remove a client from the match.
Coin
The Class Coin.
Color
The Enum Color representing the colors that a family member can have
ColoredFamiliarsVariationEffect
The Class ColoredFamiliarsVariationEffect.
CommandLineInterface
Command Line Interface play mode.
CommandObserver
 
CouncilButton
Button to place a family member into the Council area
CouncilPalace
This class represents the council palace component of the game
CouncilPalaceAction
Action related to family member placement in the council palace
CouncilPrivilegeEffect
The Class CouncilPrivilegeEffect.
Deck<T extends DevelopmentCard>
A generic deck of T type where T extends a Development Card
DeckCreator
The Class that creates the decks of different types according to the rules
DevelopmentCard
This class represents the abstract class of a generic Development Card.
Dice
Dice Abstract Data Type
DicePanel
This class represents the dice images on the boardPanel
Disapplyable
The Interface Disapplyable.
DiscardLeaderCardCommand
this command manages the possibility to discard a leader card during the game.
Effect
The abstract class Effect, it only has one method: applyEffect
EndOrDiscardPanel
The panel that lets the user choose to discard a leader card or end his round when he's already performed an action.
EveryPlayerDisconnectedException
Checked exception to signal that every player has disconnected from the game.
ExcommCube
This class represent the image of excommunication dices
ExcommTileFirstPeriod
This class represents the image of a first period excommunication tile
ExcommTileSecondPeriod
This class represents the image of a second period excommunication tile
ExcommTileThirdPeriod
This class represents the image of a third period excommunication tile
ExcommunicationEffect
The general class excommunication effect
ExcommunicationTile
This class represents an excommunication tile
ExcommunicationTilesCreator
The class that creates the excommunication tiles from file
FaithPoint
The Class FaithPoint.
FaithPointMarkerDisk
This class represents the images of the markers for the faithPoint of each player
FamilyMember
FamilyMember Abstract Data Type
FamilyMemberPawn
This class represents the Pawn image for each family member in the game
FedericoDaMontefeltroEffect
The Class FedericoDaMontefeltroEffect.
FileConstants
File paths for all resources
FilippoBrunelleschiEffect
The Class FilippoBrunelleschiEffect.
FinishRoundCommand
This class alerts the server about the end of a turn
Floor
This class represents the floors in the towers, the related action spaces have specific bonuses taken from file and here you can place the familiar
ForEachResourceTypeEffect
This effect gives n resources for each m other resources.
ForEachTypeCardEffect
This class implements the "Something"ForEachCard effect, this effect gives a specific resource to the associated player.
GamePanel
 
GraphicalUserInterface
The GUI, implementations of the User Interface using Swing and AWT components
HarvestArea
The Class representing the HarvestArea component of the game.
HarvestBonusEffect
The Class HarvestBonusEffect.
HarvestCommand
This class manages the client decision to make a harvest action
HarvestEffect
This class implements the harvest effect that gives only resources, hence a resource chest.
IllegalCardTypeException
Unchecked Exception thrown when a wrong number is in a file to create cards and tiles
ImagesConstants
The class with the constants of the images used for GUI
IndustrialAction
Class that represents the Industrial action
IndustrialArea
this class represents both the harvest and the production area, its multipleActionSpace will be initialized by the inherited classes.
InitializeMatchCommand
The command is used to notify the client that a match has been intialized
InitializeTurnCommand
The Command to notify the Client that a turn has been initialized
InitialPanel
The Initial image that the players sees while waiting for the game to start
InitialTimer
Timer thread that awaits the creation of a match if can't get to MAX_PLAYERS.
InputListener
This interface will define the behaviour of a class that listens for an input.
InputObserver
An asynchronous update interface for receiving notifications about Input information as the Input is constructed.
InputReader
This class represents the input reader: it will listen for an input and it will notify all the input listeners as soon as it will receive it.
InstantHarvestActionEffect
The Class InstantHarvestActionEffect.
InstantProductionActionEffect
The Class InstantProductionActionEffect.
InstantResourcesEffect
This class implements the InstantResourceEffect that gives a certain amount of a certain resource to a player.
InvalidActionCommand
the command used to notify the client of an invalid action
InvalidCommand
the command used to notify the client that they sent am invalid command
InvalidInputCommand
This class is made to alert the server about an invalid action made by the client
JDevelopmentCard
This class represents a general development card, it displays it and gives the functionalities offered by a JButton
JLeaderCard
This class represents a general leader card, it displays it and gives the functionalities offered by a JButton
JResource
A generic resource displaying image, name and amount.
LeaderCard
The Class representing leader cards of the game.
LeaderCardRequirement
The Class LeaderCardRequirement.
LeaderDeck
The Class LeaderDeck.
LeadersPanel
 
LorenzoDeMediciEffect
The Class LorenzoDeMediciEffect.
LoseCommand
the command to notify a client that they aren't the winner of the match
LosePointsBasedOnResourcesEffect
You lose "victoryPoints" points for every "resource" you have at the end of the game.
LosePointsEveryWoodStoneEffect
Lose victoryPoints points for every wood or stone pictured in the costs of the cards you have of the specified CardType type.
LosePointsForEveryResourceEffect
You lose "victoryPoints" points for every "resource" of type: wood,stone,servants,coin you have at the end of the game.
LucreziaBorgiaEffect
The Class LucreziaBorgiaEffect.
LudovicoAriostoEffect
The Class LudovicoAriostoEffect.
LudovicoIlMoroEffect
The Class LudovicoIlMoroEffect.
Market
This class represents the market area, this is made of four different single action spaces where you can place one familiar to get a specific resource bonus
MarketAction
This class represents the placement in a market slot action
MarketButton
Market buttons UI component
Match
Class that represents a match
MatchFullException
Checked exception thrown when Match is full
MatchHandler
Controller according to the MVC model.
MatchHandlerObserver
This interface is used to implement the MVC pattern between the two ClientHandler concrete classes and the MatchHandler
MatchObserver
Implemented by the MatchHandler class.
MatchSaver
 
MilitaryPoint
The Class MilitaryPoint.
MilitaryPointMarkerDisk
This class represents the images of the markers for the military points of each player
MultipleActionSpace
This class is the generic multiple action space, the one that characterizes the council palace and the big production and harvest areas.
MultipleEffect
This effect takes two effects and apply them in a row.
MultipleHarvestButton
Button to place a family member in the multiple harvest area.
MultipleProductionButton
Button to place a family member in the multiple production area.
MyFrame
Main frame of the game.
NetworkConstants
This class contains the constants related to the network connections
NetworkInterface
The Interface that abstracts common networking operations.
NetworkInterfaceFactory
Factory pattern to generate NetworkInterface implementors.
NoEffect
The Class NoEffect was needed in order not to check if a card's effect is null before applying it
NoFloorBonusEffect
The Class NoFloorBonusEffect if applied to a player, the player doesn't get Tower's floors bonuses when he takes a card
NotAnExchangeEffectException
The unchecked exception to signal that effect is not an exchange effect of a building card
NotApplicableException
This is a checked Exception, the caller of an action must deal with the fact that the action should be not applicable.
NotifyExcommunicationCommand
the command used to notify the excommunication status to the client
NotifySatanActionCommand
 
Occupable
The Interface Occupable exposes some methods to every object of the game that can be occupied by a Family Member
OpponentStatusChangeCommand
The command to notify that another player has changed its status, this message brings only information that every player can see from the game board
OrderMarkerDisk
This class represents the images of the marker discs to show the order of in-game players
Period
Periods of the game
PersonalBoard
The player personal board, it extends JFrame, and it's the only "external" frame in the GUI
PersonalBoardPanel
The panel containing the image of the personal board of the player, it has the layout manager set to null so that components (Development Cards) can be scaled and positioned in the correct position based on the screen dimension
PersonalBonusTile
PersonalBonusTile component of the game
PicoDellaMirandolaEffect
The Class PicoDellaMirandolaEffect.
PlaceIntoCouncilPalaceCommand
the Client uses this command to place a pawn in the council palace
PlaceIntoMarketCommand
the command used to place a pawn into one of the market areas
Player
This is the player class, everyone in the match is linked with an instance of this class
PlayerColor
 
PlayerDisconnectedCommand
 
PlayerMoveCommand
The class to notify the server about the client's move
PlayerResources
The panel showing the resources of the player, note that the points aren't shown here because everyone can see them in the board panel
PlayerStatusChangeCommand
This command has to be sent only to the client representing the same player as the one in the field.
ProductionActivationCommand
This command is sent when the user has already chosen between the various resource exchange effects that the cards he owns have.
ProductionArea
The Class representing the production area of the game board.
ProductionBonusEffect
The Class ProductionBonusEffect.
ProductionChoices
The panel that lets the user selects the different choices he has for the production action he intended to do
ProductionCommand
This command was needed to treat in a different way the production and its relative resource exchange choices.
ProductionEffect
This class represents the production effect of a building card, it differs from other effects because its actual effect is applied only when a production on the card is activated.
RaiseValueWithDiscountEffect
The Class RaiseValueWithDiscountEffect.
ReconnectionAnswerCommand
Reconnection answer from the client: provides answer, username, password
RefreshBoardCommand
This is the command used to process the board changes by refreshing it
RequestClosureCommand
the command to ask the server to close the connection
Resource
The Class Resource.
ResourceChest
This class represents a generic resource set, it has a map with key: Resource Type to get direct access to a resource
ResourceFactory
A factory for creating Resource objects based on a parameter.
ResourceMalusEffect
The Class ResourceMalusEffect.
ResourcesExchangeEffect
The Class ResourcesExchangeEffect represents a type of effect which can be found only in a Building Card and can only be activated when the player activates a production The exchange gives the player the possibility to pay a certain amount of up to three resources type in order to receive a certain amount of up to two resources type This effect also includes the possibility to have a XOR choice on the exchange .
ResourceType
The Enum ResourceType.
ResourceTypeException
The unchecked exception thrown when an invalid resource type is passed to the Resource Factory
RoundedBorder
A rounded border used for market buttons and single production and harvest
RoundTimer
Timer thread that counts down available time for a client to perform their round.
RoundTimerExpiredCommand
This class notifies the client that his time to move has expired
SantaRitaEffect
The Class SantaRitaEffect.
SatanChoiceCommand
Command that notifies the Satan's choice
SatanPanel
 
SendCredentialsCommand
This class represents the message with client credentials received by server
Servant
The Class Servant.
Server
Server main duties: - Managing of Listeners - Create Match instances and run them - Managing of disconnecting clients
ServerCommandHandler
Client to server commands handler: Manages the client command requests.
ServerInterface
Interface that abstract server operations: Implementors will use different data structures invalid input: '&' technologies and provide these server operations.
ServerLauncher
Server launcher: Instantiates Server to listen to clients and spawn matches.
ServerRMIListener
Wrapper around the RMI connection layer: Binds ClientHandlers to RMI connections to allow remote method invocation
ServerSocketListener
The listener for receiving Socket events, this is instantiated by the server and listens for new clients that try to connect to the server via socket
ServerToClientCommand
ServerToClientCommand abstract class: It represents a generic command from server to client.
ServerToClientCommandObserver
An asynchronous update interface for receiving client notifications
SetNoCardTypeFinalPointsEffect
Excommunication effect: you don't get the final victory points from the "cardType" Card Type
SetNoMarketActionEffect
If activated, doesn't let the player position a family member into the market anymore
SetServantsDividerEffect
This effect when applied only sets a value for the servantsDivider field in bonus of a player.
SetSkipRoundEffect
If applied to a player, this effect doesn't allow the user to play when it's his turn
SigismondoMalatestaEffect
The Class SigismondoMalatestaEffect.
SingleActionSpace
This class is the generic single action space that you can find in floors, markets and in small production and harvest area.
SingleHarvestButton
Button to place a family member in the single harvest area.
SingleProductionButton
Button to place a family member in the single production area.
SistoIVEffect
The Class SistoIVEffect.
StartTurnCommand
the command used to notify that the turn has started
Stone
The Class Stone.
StrategyEditor
This Panel is a simple text editor the player can use to write notes about the status of the other players that he's now allowed to freely see in our version of the game, this decision was made to make the game more challenging and to rewards the player who better use this feature and are constantly monitoring the actions of other players.
TakeCardAction
This class represents the action of placing a family member onto an action space of a tower and taking the corresponding card, it throws a NotApplicableException with a field that states why the action is not applicable .
TakeCardCommand
the client uses this command to take a card from the game board and to place a pawn in the related floor
TakeCardEffect
The Class TakeCardEffect.
TerritoryCard
A card of type Territory
TerritoryDeck
A deck of territory cards
Tower
This class represents the four towers in the game: TERRITORY,CHARACTER,BUILDING,VENTURE.
User
This class represents a User logged into the game
UserInterface
The Interface UserInterface to be implemented by the different type of views
UserInterfaceFactory
A factory for creating UserInterface objects.
UsersCreator
This class handles the I/O for the users.txt file
VentureCard
A card of type Venture
VentureCostResourceChest
 
VentureDeck
A deck of venture cards
VictoryPoint
The Class VictoryPoint.
VictoryPointMarkerDisk
This class represents the markers to show the victory points amount of each player
WinCommand
This command is used to notify the winner of the game
Wood
The Class Wood.
WrongClientHandlerException
The checked exception thrown when the passes Client Handler doesn't have a player associated
WrongPasswordCommand
Signals the user that the password they inserted was not correct
WrongPlayerException
A checked Exception to signal a wrong player to send a command to has been selected
